1.content: Welcome to the world of Pokemon! Now... What Pokemon are you?
1.title: The World of Pokemon!

15.content: What other Pokemon do you want?
15.title: Other

151.content: which will it be a eevee or its evolutions
151.title: Eeveelutions?

1511.content: you wake up in a clear grass field near a lake you go to rub your eyes with your hands but their paws!!!! you start to panic as you go to the pond and see a eevee staring out of the water at you looking panicked and you say "woah pokemon arn't real i guess they are" you go to get drink of water when something comes out of a bush and you fall into the pond *splash* as you are splashing you see the figure is a ......
1511.title: eevee

15111.content: is a pokemon but you still can't see well, so you rub your eyes to clear your vision only to see a........
15111.title: pokemon

15112.content: its a trainer but is it a boy or girl?
15112.title: trainer

151121.content:
As the male trainer comes by and sees you struggling in the water he calls out his bayleef and tells it to use vine whip and pull you out of the pond as you feel your self lifted and set on land. You begin to shiver because of the cold water and somewhat chilly air he sees this and sets up a camp and makes a fire. And sits you near it to warm you up as you are soon feeling warmer you then proceed to walk over to him.

He says "How you feeling warmer I hope?" "Eevee." And you run u to him giving him several nice licks across the cheek he slowly and gently pushes you away he then says "Well... Someone is apparently thanking me for the help... I guess in the morning we will part ways." You simply run up and hug him as much as an eevee can he sees this and asks "Seems your growing attached to me, So little girl as I see would you like to come with me?"

Your eyes brighten up as you run over tackling him and muzzle him finally saying "Eevee Eve." And proceed to lick him again as he slowly pulls you off his face this time and gives you a hug as you hug him back as much as an Eevee can. He then pulls out a luxury ball... Meant to foster friendship quicker than other pokéballs even though you were getting closer already he taps your head softly. As you are in the ball it is very cozy for a pokeball.

Not like this is expected for luxury balls. As he soon pulls you out of the pokeball you see him in a sleeping bag as he says "Thought you might want to sleep with your new trainer..." "Vee." And proceed to run to him and tackle him a third time as he says "Some one has an energetic personality. Come here... What should I call you... Amber?" You shake your head "Hmmm... Holly?" Nope. "Angelica... Nah too long Tiffiny... Still a little long... I got it Eve!" You like this name as you say "Eevee Eve." And nuzzle him as he pulls you closer he soon proceeds to hug you.

You both lay together inside the sleeping bag by the fire. In the morning you are the first on up you go get a drink of water and walk over to his belt and counted 1...2...3... And press the button releasing his typhlosion and ask it to light another fire as you were cold. It replies "Sure no problem I don't blame you for being cold." He then makes a fire with his flamethrower after doing that presses the button non his pokéball you soon go sit near the fire then decide to lay down near... Ummm... He never told you his name.

You don't really care at the moment frankely your still a bit tired and lay down in the sleeping bag by his head and torso.
151121.title: boy

1511211.content:
As you are sleeping peacefully you are soon woken up by a soft shake which could only be Damon.... His name he told you last night As you wake up you yawn and start to lick his face. He pulls you off and into a hug before saying "Time to head to the next city veridian city. You wanna walk or ride in your pokeball? Say vee for walk and eevee for pokeball." You think about the options and decide...

Sorry for short chapter
1511211.title: He waked you up

15112111.content:
"Vee." So you want to walk to the next town with me Eve. Fine let me finish packing up then we will head out." "Vee" As you wish you could help with the packing up you can think of one way to help evolving into an espeon you look up and see it's daytime so you focus your hardest and channel as much emotion you can. Soon you feel your DNA startin to change as you also begin to glow Damon turns around to see the glowing form of his cute eevee.

As you bust forward a pink Espeon saying a loud and proud "ESPEON." "Eve... You evolved why?" You struggle with your psycic skills and manage to say "Me... Wanna... Help... Master... Jaden!" He looks at you smiles pucks you up hugs you and says "Thanks, but I think you should practice with your new psycic powers first. So you don't accidentally break something." You let's out a big sigh and says "But soon you can help me..."
15112111.title: Vee walk

151121112.content:
You droop your ears in dissapointment *I really want to help clean up, but he is right if I don't practice I could either break something or end up throwing it. How can I practice at it?* You look around and see some small rocks which you use your power struggling to lift them.

*This is harder than I thought I could have become a flareon to light fires or a vaporeon to help clean dishes...* "You ok down there?" "Espeon?" "You looked lost in thought down there." "Esp..." "You didn't have to evolve yet it was up to you if you wanted to help me. When you have better control of your powers feel free to help whenever."
151121112.title: On the way there practicing

151122.content: its a girl who comes walking she sees you and says "hi eevee im amy would you like to come with me"? you say "sure amy i'll come with you" as you nod she understands and brings out a pokeball taps your head lightly as you are sucked in you see a big prarie and a pokemon made bed you go over to it and feel it its so soft you decide to lay in it and feel sleepy as you go to sleep sooner or later you are pulled out of your pokeball and soon are being shaken gently as you hear "eevee wake up come on on eevee" you yawn and stretch out she giggles she pulls out another pokeball and lets out a.........
151122.title: girl

1511221.content: she lets out a shiny....
1511221.title: shiny pokemon

1521.content:
You're a Vulpix, and you're a boy? Ok, that's all I need. Let's get started!



You wake up in your cave home, next to your mother, a Ninetales. She is still sleeping. Your home is on the side of a volcano, perfect for you. You nudge your mother in an attempt to wake her up, but it's useless; she's in a deep sleep. You walk outside and view your surroundings. Same as every other day: ashes and rocks. You breathe a small puff of smoke and walk to one of the rocks when...
1521.title: Boy

15212.content: as you wander outside your mother Ninetails wakes up she gets really nervous that you aren't beside her and runs outside to look for you she spots you and grabs you with her mouth. She takes you back in the cave but as she gets in you hear a noise. what is it?
15212.title: Mom wakes up.

choices: yes im starving i gotta eat it
no it could be a trap
152121.content: A blonde girl about 5"6 and looks to be 16 comes into your cave. You stare at her in amazement and she comes up and throws a ball at the ground a red light emerges from it and turns into a Charizard. Your mother puts you down and you walk behind her scared. You see that this Charizard is ginormous and you start shaking a what it looks like. Your mother just stares at the Charizard and then uses flamethrower. The Charizard takes a couple of steps back like it didn't do much to harm it it attacks your mother back by using slash, this hurts your mother but then your mother attacks it back with slash but this is a critical hit that is done to the Charizard. The girl smiles at you. You realize why, the Charizard comes up to you and then uses flamethrower you fall to the ground in pain. Your mother gets pissed off and uses hidden power but sadly it is razor leaf dealing little damage to the Charizard. This goes on for a while but soon your mother gets to weak to fight and the girl throws a ball that looks exactly like the one the Charizard came out of. You get scared as your mother is no where in sight. You stare at the girl blankly and then the Charizard. You don't notice that the girl stepped closer to you but then you walk back slowly and start getting faster. You see this girl was smart and knew to come after you because she knew that you were the off spring of this Ninetails. You reach the end of the cave and its starting to get a little to hot for you. You start shaking thinking of where you will go if this girl throws that ball at you. As she comes she sees your scared so she puts a berry on the ground and slowly walks behind a rock so you cant see her. You think she is gone and you start to get hungry you see the berry and you think should you eat it.
152121.title: a female trainer

choices: you run into the Charizard again
1521211.content: You head over to the berry and eat it but just then the girl comes from behind a rock with her Charizard and gets out the ball you see it and try to run past her but just then the Charizard blocks the way. You run head first into its leg and fall down. Both the Charizard and the girl laugh. You start whimpering thinking that its the end for you. Something hits you and your in a somewhat roomy area you run to the walls and try to find a way out but sadly your trapped. You feel the dome is floating up and then you start falling down and finally it stops. You wait in there for what seems like days but finally the dome starts floating again and it starts crashing. You see a bright light and then as your eyes adjust your in a area that you don't recognize its all pink, purple, blue and green. But then you see your mother. You get scared as you see the girl again so you try to run to your mother but then......
1521211.title: yes im starving i gotta eat it

choices: walks past you to go on her computer
15212112.content: The girl grabs you. You struggle to get out of her grip but its useless. So you think to your self what if i bite her. So of course you try to but you cant her hands are right under your armpits and you only bite air. You look at your mother who looks a bit worried at what she is doing to you but then she looks a different way. You look that way to and you see 2 more girls one has brown hair one has dark one has red the one with brown hair looks to be about 5"2 and the one with red hair looks to be about 5"4. They are both laughing at you trying to get away. Eventually she lets you go and you run to your mother. Your mother pushes you over to a bowl of food and tells you to eat it so of course you do you taste it and you actually like it. While your eating the two girls leave and its just you, your mom, the girl and a couple other pokemon. The girl comes up to you and your mom and she......
15212112.title: the girl grabs you

154.content: So are we gardevoir or maybe a legendary?
154.title: Other (again)

1541.content:
Male or Female?

Yes there can be male I don't know how?
1541.title: Gardevoir the embrace pokémon

15412.content:
You wake up in a field where you look down to see large E-cup breasts thinking *These are larger than my original pair!* you slowl stand up suddenly you can feel the pokemon around you. *I guess I can sense others.* You walk around a bit before a pack of mightyena attack saying "What are you doing in our field?"

They all attack you causing you great pain you fall to your knees thinking *Someone help me!* you see out of your blurry vision a large pokemon and some other thing with it before passing out. *I hope they are griendly.* You soon wake up faintly to hear "Don't worry you'll be fine I promise!" "Voir?" Realizing that the voice was male.

*Where is he taking me? To the poké center I hope my body aches so badly!* "Were almost there!" You look to see a red building. *The poké center.* Before laying back to rest. "Nurse Joy Come Quick!" "Oh, what is it?" She see's your badly injured body. "What happened?" "She was attacked by a pack of wild mightyenas!" "Bring her to the back."
15412.title: Female

154121.content:
In the back she looks you over as you groan in pain “Voir.” “She is in a horrible state lucky you helped her or she could have died.” “Guess it was lucky I showed up.” “Voir.” “She may have to stay a couple days, do you want to stay and watch over her? She may want to come with you for helping her.” “Yes, I helped her I want to see her recover.” “I’ll give you a room for the days she is recovering.” “Thanks Nurse Joy.”

As they leave the room *Thank you trainer, I can never repay your for what you did for me.* Nurse Joy comes in and runs some tests. “You’re going to make a full recovery. That trainer was really worried about you.” “Voir?” “Yes, he wants to stay until you recover he care about you so much.” “Voir…” “He is upstairs tomorrow you may go see him for a bit. “Voir.” You slowly nod before you fall asleep to a warm feeling. *Is it the table healing me that is making me feel warm is this healing me?*

You soon open your eyes to realize that it is dark out… *How long was I out? I still hurt but not as much as before.* You slowly sit up where you see Nurse Joy still running some tests. “Oh you’re awake, did you want to go see Jaden?” You think then slowly nod. *So his name is Jaden… I must find a way to thank him… Not sure how though…” You are told the second door on the left. “Voir.” You walk in to see him sitting on his bed. You walk up to him and tap his shoulder.

He looks up and see’s you… “You feel any better?” “Yes…” “I thought you might speak to me telepathic but not clearly…” “Is… It… Bad?” “No I thought that since you were badly hurt you might not be able to use your powers efficiently, but it is ok… is there anything you want to talk about?” “How… I… Repay… You?” “Huh, oh it was no problem. I just decided to help in that moment.” “May… I… Be… You’re… Pokémon?” “Of course, it is alright with me... I expected something like that.” You reach forward and hug him. “Thank… You… I… Must… Rest…” “I’ll help you down there.” “Thank… you…”

As you lay in his arms you feel like you are growing closer and closer to him… “We’re here.” You are laid down on the bed for rest. “Thank… You… Jaden…” “How did you know my name?” “Nurse… Joy…” “I will check on you tomorrow.” “Good… Night. Jaden…” You soon drift off to a peaceful slumber. *I am so lucky to have met someone as nice as Jaden.* You soon wake up to the sun in your eyes. *Ugh I feel much better today.*

You get up and find your almost fully recovered *One more day and I think I am safe to leave with Jaden…* “Good morning Sunshine!” You look to see Jaden walking into the door. You run over and hug him again. “I missed you.” “You’re very clingy I’m guessing?” “I lived by myself in the woods for 3 years.” “I see you must have been very lonely.” You simply nod “I had no friends and was always on the move when I was in that field.”

“I feel so sorry for you being all alone with no one and always on the move… I will always take care of you.” Your eyes tear up from happiness. You squeeze him saying “Thank you Jaden I will always do my best for you.” “I am glad you’re feeling better though Nurse Joy said one more day.” “I thought I needed about that…”
154121.title: In the back

1541211.content:
The last day of you being in the Pokemon Center has finally arrived "It feels good ot be healthy again... You meant it when you said you would care for me always?" "Of course I don't make promises in thin air." "Thank you Jaden so much I still feel like i haven't repayed you fully." "I told you dont worry about repaying me... I can't think of anything you could do to repay me but if you do it would be nice I am sure." You can't help but smile at this hapy moment he has made for you.

*This is not the end I will find some way to pay you back for what you have done for me i must find someway to pay you back.* You guys soon arrive in the next town where the gym type happens to be a fighting type gym weak to Psychic and Flying type knowing your a Psychic tpye decinding to repay him by fighting this entire gym by yourself if you have to... *I will do my hardest here.*

You both head to the Pokemon Center to get a room you both had decided to rest for the night before facing the gym you a Psychic type had the advantage but what if his pokemon knew counters to their weakness... *I will win this badge for Jaden I don't care how much of my energy it takes!*
1541211.title: Skip to tommorow

15412112.content:
You all had booked a room at the Pokemon Center. You guys decide to head out for the gym in the morning after you guys had made battle preparations. You all had time to relax as you snuggle close to Jaden. "You feeling clingy. I undrstand that you lived alone and always on the move but this is a little close." "Please, Jaden i just want to be close to you..." Giving him some sad eyes that as he looks into he sees your pain from the past.

"Wow, you have been through a lot..." "How do you know this exactly?" "I can see into pokemon memories..." "Does anyone else know this?" "No and I would prefere it to stay that way." "I can keep that a secret Jaden, but i must be able to be close to wheni feel so." "Deal I don't want anyone questioning me about it." "I promise Jaden." And you both lay down for a rest.

In the morning you are still asleep as Jaden slippes away to take a shower. "Jaden..." Reaching for him but not finding him you wake up. "Where is Jaden?" You hear water running and a slight humming that sounds fimiliar. "Oh, he is taking a what is it the humans call it? I can't remember as i have never had a trainer before... I have heard people talking." He walks out fully dressed and hair fluffed like you had seen yesterday. "Oh your up! Well good morning." "Good morning Jaden."

You all got some supplies as you all head into the gym... *I will prove myself to him here!* The gym leader stand on a field. "Welcome Trainer this is the Fighting gym you are here to challenge me right?" "Yes, Sir." "Then let's begin are you going to start off with Gardevoir who is not that bad..." You blush a scarlet hue. "Voir..." Jaden turns to you. "You want to go first?" You nod and rush forward. he summons a machoke... "Machoke!" You ready yourself.

"Trainer get's first move..." "Ok Gardevoir use Pyschic." Your eyes glow green as the mahoke is enveloped in a green Aura where you lift him before ramming him into the ground several times. "Machoke... Use Seismic Toss." "Gardevoir... Teleport!" "Voir." just before he grabs you, you teleport just behind him. "Now Mirrow Move." You grab him before launching into the air and slamming him into the ground.

The dust clears to show Machoke had fainted. "Machoke is Unable to battle. Gardevoir wins." "Gardevoir can you go on?" You think and nod. "Ok. I believe in you..." The next Pokemon he summons is a Makuhita. "Use Giga Impact!" "Use Protect." The attack bounces off. "Mirror Coat." You summon a barrier to reflect 1/4 damage of special moves damage. "Brick Break!" "That will undo my Mirror Coat." You teleport but before you do the Barrier breaks. "I was too slow." You suddenly decide to use your hidden Power.

Your whole body glows as does the opponent's... the body of his start to glitch someone like it is fading. "What move is that?" "Mirage Away." The pokemon then faints as it become solid again. "Makuhita is unable to battle that means the wiiner is Jaden." You run over to Jaden and hug him before fainting in his arms from exhaustion. Next thing you know you wake up ona bed which you recognize as the bed at the pokemon center. "Where am I?" "Were back at the pokemon center you fainted from exhaustion."

"Oh, I did strain myself pretty hard I guess I wanted to impress you, but instead just drained myself." "Awe, it's ok you didnt have to battle them both." "I know i wanted to though to prove myself worthy of your command." "You are my very special close Gardevoir." "Thank you Jaden." Blushing a scarlet hue. "I got to go take a shower." "Ok, see you in a little bit." So you lay back down and fall asleep on the bed. "Gardevoir... Dinner time." "Oh, ok." You both head downstairs for food.

You both sit down and eat as you quietly eat you pokemon food which you really had had nothing like before having eaten berries then chased by angry pokemon... you like being safe and close to Jaden. *I am so lucky to have Jaden in my life... I was so lonely and have never had any real friends as I was always on the move.* Jaden looks over to see you lost in thought. "Everything ok Gardevoir?" "Huh? Oh yeah everything is fine..." Blushing. "Well, eat up I dont want my pokemon to go hungry during battles." "Yes, Jaden."

You begin to eat again as you all finish you head upstairs and lay on the floor not sure as you has always slept on the ground. "What are you doing?" "Sleeping is something wrong?" "Yeah, why are you sleeping on the ground?" "I have always slept like this while on the move..." "Make's sense as you had no real place to stay..."

"Here come sleep with me..." You blush suddenly. "Um... you mean it?" "Yeah I dont want my pokemon to sleep on the floor." You get up and walk over and lay down by him saying "What is this it is comfy i have never experienced something like this?" "It's called a bed." "Interesting are they always here?" "Yeah lt?" "Yeah can I sleep in it with you more often?" "Yeah, it is better than sleeping on the floor. We will camp out sometimes." "Camp out?"

"I'll explain that later. right now let's sleep." "Ok Jaden." You both lay down on the bed where you fall into a peaceful slumber with some dreams. *What is this feeling? It is around Jaden...* *It feels like a fuzzy feeling...* *What is this feeling? It is strange i have never experienced it before.* You feel a slight shaking... "Gardevoir wake up..." "Huh?" "Breakfast time."

"Oh, Ok then." *Yawn* You slowly rise from the bed with out feeling any pain as you have from sleeping on the cold hard ground. "I haven't slept that well in years." "Did you enjoy it?" "Yes very much so..." You walk up to Jaden and kiss his cheek. "Thank you for letting me sleep with you." You both blush at what you had done. "I feel fuzzy..." "Fuzzy how?" "I feel all fuzzy when ever I am around you... I think i have feeling for you..." Blushing again.
15412112.title: Preparations are in Order

info.description: Ever wonder what it'd be like to live as a Pokemon? Here's the answer! Vore is allowed, but only soft. I prefer not to write vore, so I'd appreciate if someone else could do it for me. The only rules I have are: 1. Only soft vore is allowed. 2. Don't curse/cuss too much. 3. Chapters with barely any text will be deleted.
